 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרֻדָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==grain of seed== (?) (properly, si vera lectio, the ***separated***; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרִידָא‎</span>, ***pebble, berry***); — only plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרֻדוֺת‎</span> [[Joel.1.17|Joel 1:17]].
